Name: David Dinkins - Willis Avenue Bridge.
Title: A Local Law in relation to the naming of the David Dinkins - Willis Avenue Bridge.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. The following bridge located in the Boroughs of Manhattan and The Bronx is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.  

New Name	 Present Name 	
David Dinkins - Willis Avenue Bridge	 Willis Avenue Bridge 	

§2. The official map of the city of New York shall be amended in accordance with 

the provisions of section one of this local law.

§3. This local law shall take effect immediately.









PM
LS# 2459
5/31/12
